coupon.sys.core.dao.db.utils

Class EmailingProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.core.dao.db.utils.EmailingProcess

  • public class EmailingProcess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class responsible to generate and to send an email associated with the DailyCouponExpirationTask. In case of successful process and a success message will be sent with the deleted coupons In case of failure process and failure message will be sent
    Author:
    Yehuda.Hizmi

                                        java.lang.String message,
                                        java.lang.String to,
                                        java.lang.String cc)
                                 throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException,
                                        javax.mail.MessagingException
        This method build the message and sent it
        Parameters:
        subject - - The relevant subject (success or failure)
        message - - The relevant message (success or failure)
        to - - The to recipients
        cc - - The cc recipients
        Throws:
        javax.mail.internet.AddressException - - The exception thrown when a wrongly formatted address is encountered.
